name: @wessberg/stringutil
description: A collection of helper functions for working with strings

scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:license & npm run generate:contributing & npm run generate:coc & npm run generate:readme & npm run generate:changelog
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:compiled
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs & npm run build:esm
scripts.pretest: npm run clean:compiled && npm run build:test
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.publish:pre: NODE_ENV=production npm run validate && NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.publish:meta: npm run generate:all && git add . && (git commit -am "Bumped version" || true) && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm run publish:pre && npm version patch && npm run publish:meta && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run publish:pre && npm version minor && npm run publish:meta && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run publish:pre && npm version minor && npm run publish:meta && npm publish
